nodes.text: From Farm-Wife to Warrior was a contemporary account concerning the treatment of female slaves during the Kymoodon Era by members of the Hutt species. In 6 ABY at the Academician of Popular Studies Thunys Albegron claimed to find the account credible when speaking at the Conference on Popular Entertainment on the planet Obroa-skai.

From Farm-Wife to Warrior was first mentioned in the 2014 fifth entry in the Star Wars: The Essential Guide to Warfare Author's Cut series of posts by Jason Fry on the StarWars.com blog. The article featured content cut from The Essential Guide to Warfare a book released in 2012 by Fry.
